title: Happy Hour: Oh Come All Ye Faithful (SATC Ep 12)
itunes:title: Happy Hour: Oh Come All Ye Faithful (SATC Ep 12)
description:
Our friend Bridget Todd joins us for a very special happy hour extravaganza to watch the season one finale of Sex and the City, "Oh Come All Ye Faithful". Bridget shares her SATC experience, and we chat about faith, boundaries, dealbreakers, and 'the one'. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
